GENERAL.loadingError: Es gab einen Fehler beim Laden der Seite. Bitte warte kurz und lade die Seite anschließend neu. Falls der Fehler bestehen bleibt, wende dich bitte an den Webseitenbetreiber (pauljustus279@gmail.com).

ARTICLES.content:
This was originally supposed to be the web page for my local motor sports club, however I decided against building a cms from scratch and instead went with wordpress. This repository is therefore only a static angular ionic page with translation, mobile support, etc. If you want to you can use this as a template for your next project.

PS: You can easily change the color by replacing the primary color in the variables.scss

PPS: Currently the page does not support dark mode.
